Support The Project

If GSD is saving you time (or making Claude Code feel actually reliable), sponsorship and word-of-mouth are the highest-leverage ways to help.

The Short Version #

  1. Star the repo so more developers find it.
  2. Sponsor the work so ongoing maintenance is sustainable.
  3. Share a concrete win (tweet, blog post, internal note) so others understand what it does.

Why Sponsorship Matters #

“I want to just go full-time working on GSD. I had no idea how I was going to do it, but my partner definitely was a little bit shocked when I was like, ‘Yeah, I’m all in on this thing that I’ve built and thousands of people are using it worldwide right now.’”
— TÂCHES

Jump to 14:12.

Ways To Contribute #

Documentation #

  • Improve examples and onboarding steps.
  • Add real-world workflows (brownfield, testing, deployment).

Commands And Workflows #

  • Tighten success criteria.
  • Add clarity to error cases.
  • Improve state handoffs.

Website #

This repository includes a GitHub Pages site under /site. If you’re reading this on the site, you’re already benefiting from it.
